member.summary: Creates a new instance of the specified view model type and binds it using the standard request data.

member.name: M:Olive.Mvc.Controller.GetCurrentLanguage
member.summary: Gets the language of the current user from cookie. If no language is specified, then the default language will be used as configured in the database.

member.name: M:Olive.Mvc.Controller.Translate(System.String)
member.summary: Will return the translation of the specified phrase in the language specified in user's cookie (or default language).

member.name: M:Olive.Mvc.Controller.Translate(Olive.Entities.ValidationException)
member.summary: Will return the translation of the specified validation exception's message in the language specified in user's cookie (or default language). If the IsMessageTranslated property is set, it will return message without extra translation.

member.name: M:Olive.Mvc.Controller.TranslateHtml(System.String)
member.summary: Will return the translation of the specified markup in the language specified in user's cookie (or default language).

member.name: M:Olive.Mvc.Controller.PartialView(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Creates a System.Web.Mvc.PartialViewResult object that renders a partial view, by using the specified view name and model.

member.name: M:Olive.Mvc.Controller.File(Olive.Entities.Blob,System.String)
member.summary: Gets a FilePathResult based on the file's path. It sets the mime type based on the file's extension.
member.param: If specified, the browser will not try to process the file directly (such as PDF files) and instead always opens the file download dialogue.

member.name: M:Olive.Mvc.RouteTemplate.Merge(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: It will merge the provided route data parameters into the pattern of the template. If any parameter in the template is non-optional, and yet a value has not been provided, it will throw an error. If any of the provided route data parameters aren't expected in the pattern, then they will be added to the query string.
